channel.title: What does srl need, cause im bored and i feel like making something wrothwhile
channel.description:
yea ^^
and i dont want any noob coming in here saying it needs something like a varrock smither, cause thats not the point of srl.

item.title: What does srl need, cause im bored and i feel like making something wrothwhile
item.dc:creator: @realrune realrune
item.description:
@realrune wrote:

Have you bothered to look at findtalk or any of those procedures in there? They find and solve(or logout and disable player if unsolvable)… just because their named differently doesn’t mean they don’t solve it.

Read full topic
item.source: What does srl need, cause im bored and i feel like making something wrothwhile

item.title: What does srl need, cause im bored and i feel like making something wrothwhile
item.dc:creator: @derek9456 derek9456
item.description:
@derek9456 wrote:

Function FindNormalRandoms: Boolean;
var
  i: Integer;
begin
  for i:=1 to 16 do
  begin
    case I of
     1:  CloseWindow;
     2:  If FindTalk then
           Result := True;
     3:  If FindDead then
           Result := True;
     4:  If FindMod then
           Result := True;
     5:  If FindMime then
           Result := True;
     6:  If FindMaze then
           Result := True;
     7:  If FindQuiz then
           Result := True;
     8:  If FindDemon then
           Result := True;
     9:  If FindScapeRune then
           Result := True;
     10: If FindTalk then    // Call it twice
           Result := True;
     11: If FindLamp(LampSkill) then // Maybe we missed it?
           Result := True;
     12: If(FindNewBox)then
          begin
            Result := True;
            if(UseBoxSolver)then
              SolveBox
            else
              GambleNewBox;
         end;
     13: If FindTrade then
           Result := True;
     14: begin
           if NoGameTab then
           begin
             Result := True;
             Players[CurrentPlayer].loc := 'No GameTab';
             Logout;
             Exit;
           end;
         end;
     15: SaveToChatLog;
     16: If SolvePinball then
           Result := True;
    end;
    wait(1);
  end;
end;

all it does is says if it is there or not

Read full topic

i think it needs a procedure that finds and solves all the normal randoms… all the solves are there seperate and finding is all there just put them together!

FindNormalRandoms already does that…
